Function Documentation

gint bem_element_nearest (  BEMElement *  e,
GtsPoint *  p,
gint *  i,
gdouble *  R
) 
 

Find element vertex which is closest to a GtsPoint.

Parameters:
e BEMElement;
p GtsPoint;
i local index of closest vertex;
R distance to closest vertex.
Returns:
0 on success.

gint bem_element_nearest_point (  BEMElement *  e,
GtsPoint *  x,
gdouble *  xi,
gdouble *  eta,
gboolean  constrain
) 
 

Given a BEMElement, find the area coordinates of the nearest point to a specified GtsPoint, using a rootfinding method. The point found need not lie on the BEMElement proper. For a plane element, this is equivalent to projection onto the plane.

Parameters:
e BEMElement;
x GtsPoint;
xi first area coordinate of nearest point on BEMElement;
eta second area coordinate of nearest point on BEMElement;
constrain if TRUE, limit the search to points which lie on the element or its boundary; if FALSE, the returned point may lie outside the element.
Returns:
0 on success.

gboolean bem_element_point_inside (  BEMElement *  e,
gdouble  xi,
gdouble  eta
) 
 

Given the local coordinates of a point on an element, check if it lies inside the element.

Parameters:
e BEMElement
xi first local coordinate of point to check
eta second local coordinate of point to check
Returns:
TRUE if (xi, eta) lies inside the element, FALSE otherwise.
